data.title: Football Italia
data.text:
Chelsea manager Carlo Ancelotti and Porto boss Andre Villas Boas are the favourites to take over from Vincenzo Montella at Roma next season. Montella was appointed on an interim basis…

Roma's new boss Vincenzo Montella says that, despite appearances, he doesn't feel like a caretaker manager. The 36-year-old was handed the reins until the end of the season on Monday…

Fiorentina striker Adrian Mutu would like to emulate club legend Giancarlo Antognoni and score 100 goals in Serie A. The 32-year-old Romanian is currently on 90 and has 12 games…

Veteran midfielder Dejan Stankovic feels Inter are beginning to thrive under the management of Leonardo. Saturday's 1-0 win at home to Cagliari was their ninth in 11 League games this…

Antonio Conte has joined Luciano Spalletti as a possible replacement for Gigi Del Neri at Juventus in the summer. Del Neri's future in Turin is far from secure after another…

After a calamitous 2-0 defeat to Lecce on Sunday, Juventus Coach Gigi Del Neri is apparently at risk amid reports linking the club with Luciano Spalletti. Tuttosport's leading headline this…

Veteran tactician Carlo Mazzone has revealed that only his age stopped him from applying for the Roma job. Mazzone, who will be 74 next month, made the claim to Radio…

Milan midfielder Kevin-Prince Boateng is pleased to finally have returned from injury. The Ghana international came on as a second half substitute in Sunday's 2-1 win at Chievo. Boateng had…

Three men are in contention to take the Parma bench if the club opt to sack the struggling Pasquale Marino. The latter's job is on the line after a poor…

Milan boss Massimiliano Allegri claims some people forget Alexandre Pato is still only 21. The Brazil international came off the bench and scored the winner against Chievo on Sunday. Milan…

Claudio Ranieri has wished 'his lads' well for the future after he was replaced by Vincenzo Montella as Roma boss on Monday. Ranieri quit the Stadio Olimpico outfit last night…

Vincenzo Montella has arrived in Trigoria for talks about becoming Roma's caretaker boss. Claudio Ranieri offered his resignation last night following a sensational 4-3 defeat to Genoa. It was confirmed…

Struggling Catania have announced a Press silence after their defeat at Napoli left them just above the relegation zone. The Sicilians are now only three points clear of Brescia following…

Roma have formally announced the appointment of Vincenzo Montella as Claudio Ranieri's replacement. Ranieri offered his resignation last night following a sensational 4-3 defeat to Genoa. It was confirmed this…

Roma President Rosella Sensi has thanked Claudio Ranieri for his contribution to the club in the last 18 months. Ranieri tendered his resignation last night and agreed to wrap up…

Chievo striker Sergio Pellissier believes it's more than a coincidence that when his team faces clubs like Milan the referee performs poorly. The Flying Donkeys were incensed on Sunday when…

Udinese owner Gianpaolo Pozzo feels his side were mature and intelligent to record a 0-0 draw at home to relegation threatened Brescia on Sunday. The Zebrette were given a dubious…

Italy boss Cesare Prandelli feels Napoli supporters are in a position to dream this season. The Partenopei currently lie second in Serie A, just three points behind League leaders Milan.…

Roma legend Ciccio Graziani believes that Vincenzo Montella isn't experienced enough to coach the club. The 36-year-old has been promoted from his job working with Roma's Under-14s and replaces Claudio…

Cesena President Igor Campedelli is fed up with receiving threats and is considering leaving the club. Fans of the Seahorses have been more than vocal in their protests at the…
